lang.name: Language
lang.description:
The language for me to use to talk to you.
If the server's language is forced, this setting will have no effect on users.

override_guild_lang.name: Force server language
override_guild_lang.description: Force using the language of this server instead of using every single user's language.

log_channel_id.name: Logs channel
log_channel_id.description: The channel where moderation logs will be sent.

ping_on_reply.name: Ping when replying
ping_on_reply.description: Pings you when I reply to your messages.

yt_news_channel_id.name: YouTube Video notifications channel
yt_news_channel_id.description: The channel where YouTube notifications will be sent.

yt_news_message.name: YouTube Video message
yt_news_message.description: The message to send when a new video is uploaded.
